capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Flitwick's role as a professor and his mantra, which is really inspiring. capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is indeed the title of my professor at Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about it, and I have to say, he's a very inspiring figure in my life as a young witch.
